title: Socket-outlet Earthing Requirements
fullText:
Socket-outlets shall be provided with an earthing terminal or connection that is connected to the protective earthing conductor of the final subcircuit supplying the socket-outlet.

Exception: Socket-outlets need not be provided with an earthing terminal or connection if they are—
• (a) supplied at extra-low voltage; or
• (b) supplied by a separated extra-low voltage system.
